fire department: to bug off, to go away
to condemn, to convict, to sentence
to take over, to become dominant
to smoke, to puff, to breathe in and out smoke from a cigarette/cigar/pipe
to have in mind, to consider
sommelier knife, corkscrew with bottle opener and small knife
to have a gag reflex, to retch
to lead up the garden path, to deceive
every now and then, occasionally, incidental
